error.message: Call to deprecated method setExpectedException() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Backward compatibility for PHPUnit 4 will no longer be supported.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to erg.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
